description: Details pursuant to conditions 9 (materials), 10 (landscaping) and 11 (construction method statement) of Full Planning Permission reference 24/1252 dated 1 November, 2024, for Demolition of existing side extension, conservatory and garage and erection of attached two storey building with converted roof space, erection of a part single storey, part-two storey side-to-rear extension with new front door, hip to gable end roof extension with rear dormer window, three front rooflights and replacement of front door with window to existing dwellinghouse, 3 front rooflights, 3 side rooflights and 1 rear rooflight to new attached building to create 7 self-contained flats, relocation of vehicular access, provision for car parking, cycle and refuse storage, associated landscaping and sub-division of rear amenity space
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
